pages.text: $(thing)Sheeps$() wool can be dyed by pressing the use key or the interact button while holding any dye. $(br2)If a $(thing)Sheep$() is dyed and then sheared, it retains its new dyed $(item)Wool$() color after the it regrows.

$(n)Easter Egg:$() $(br2)If a $(thing)Sheep$() is named $(o)jeb_$() with a $(item)Name Tag$(), its $(item)Wool$() cycles with interpolation through all dye colors. $(br2)This does not affect the dropped $(item)Wool$().
